headline: Jim Cramer Says Darden Restaurants (DRI) Is Serving Up “Premium Value”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer On 9 Stocks That Are Rallying Despite Tariff Worries. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses as rallying despite tariff worries. On Monday, Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, […]
